Detailed Description

Manage sensor.

The POB-Robotics-Suite has 8 ports, identify has 1 to 8. You can plug different sensor on channel, likes:

  • Light sensor
  • GP2D12 infrared distance sensor
  • RGB Led
  • Contact sensor (or Bump sensor)
  • Line follower
  • Camera
  • IR Beacon

If you want read an analog input, see the analog functions. If you want use instead the digital input/output pins, see the input/output functions.

The InitRobot function initialize all the low level hardware of the robot: You don't have to manage all the low level stuff.

Example: Init the POB-Robotics-Suite Hardware and Read a distance sensor
#include <pobRoboticSuite.h>

int main(void)
{
    UInt32 i;
    UInt32 value;
    SensorType * sensors;

    // Init hardware:
    InitCpu();
    InitUART0Intr(115200);
    sensors = InitRobot();

    for(i=0;i<CHANNEL_NUMBER;i++)
    {
        DebugPrintf("Sensor[%d] is: %d\r\n", i, sensors[i] );
    }


    while(1)
    {
        // Get distance from a GP2D12 Infrared sensor:

        // You have to connect this sensor on port 1 for this example:

        value = GetDistanceSensor(1);

        DebugPrintf("Distance from channel 0 is: %d\r\n", value);
    }

    return 0;
}

#define CHANNEL_NUMBER   8

Number of input/output channel

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum _sensor_type_

Sensor type enumeration.

Enumerator:
SENSOR_UNKNOWN 

[0] Unknown or no device found

SENSOR_ANA_IN 

[1] An analog input

SENSOR_ANA_DIG_IN 

[2] An analog input and a digital input

SENSOR_DIG_IN 

[3] A digital input

SENSOR_DIG_OUT 

[4] A digital output

SENSOR_I2C 

[10] An Unknown I2C device

SENSOR_I2C_LINESENSOR_SHARP 

[11] Line Follower

SENSOR_I2C_RGBLED 

[12] Red Green Blue Led device

SENSOR_I2C_24LED 

[13] 24 LED Display

SENSOR_I2C_MOTORDRIVER 

[14] Direct Current Motor

SENSOR_I2C_ULTRASONIC 

[15] Ultrasonic sensor

SENSOR_I2C_TEMPSENSOR 

[16] Temperature sensor

SENSOR_I2C_EEPROM 

[17] Eeprom memory

SENSOR_I2C_ACCELEROMETER 

[18] Accelerometer sensor

SENSOR_I2C_COMPASS 

[19] Compass

SENSOR_I2C_IRBEACON 

[20] IR Beacon

SENSOR_I2C_IRDA 

[21] IRDA transceiver

SENSOR_I2C_PORTEXPANDER 

[22] Port expander

SENSOR_I2C_CAMERA 

[23] Camera

SENSOR_I2C_VEXPANDER 

[24] VEX port expander

SENSOR_I2C_MINIVEX 

[25] MiniVEX port expander

SENSOR_I2C_IRFOLLOWER 

[26] IR Follower

UInt32 GetDistanceSensor ( UInt8  port  ) 

Get distance from a GP2D12 Sharp sensor or a Line Sensor.

Parameters:
port Port where distance sensor is connected (from 1 to 8).
Returns:

Get light intensity from the light sensor.

Parameters:
port Port where light sensor is connected (from 1 to 8).
Returns:
A percentage of ligth received (0% = dark, 100% = sun light).

void InitCamera ( void   ) 

Initialize the camera of the Pob-Robotics-Suite.

Warning:
You need to connect the camera sensor!
SensorType* InitRobot ( void   ) 

Initialize the hardware of the POB-Robotics-Suite.

This functions initialize the i2c0 bus as master, the digital input/output, analog input and initialize various hardware on the robot. The function search sensors connected on the port and initialize one by one the connected sensor.

Returns:
A pointer to an array of SensorType discovered on the port.
